faceEnrollment.reenrollmentAlert.descrip.translation: Let Cozmo re-scan your face so that he can recognize you more easily

faceEnrollment.instructions.translation:
Cozmo needs to check you out! Look at Cozmo straight on, and hold still.

When he's done, you'll hear a chime.

faceEnrollment.faceEnrollmentList.descri.translation:
Tap an available slot to introduce Cozmo to a new person.
Tap an existing entry to edit, update, or delete it.

faceEnrollment.instructions.top.translation: Look at Cozmo straight on, and hold still

faceEnrollment.instructions.bottom.translation: When Cozmo is done, he'll say your name

faceEnrollment.unlockView.description.translation:
Unlock this slot to allow
Cozmo to recognize another person.

faceEnrollment.errors.timeOut.title.translation: Cozmo is having trouble seeing you

faceEnrollment.errors.timeOut.descriptio.translation: Make sure you're in a well-lit room and are aligned with Cozmo's face. Cozmo should be on a flat, stable surface.

faceEnrollment.howToPlay.emptySlot.translation: Tap an empty slot to teach Cozmo a new name

faceEnrollment.howToPlay.eraseIcon.translation: Tap the erase icon to clear a slot

faceEnrollment.howToPlay.existingPerson.translation: Tap to Update this slot and let Cozmo re-scan this face

faceEnrollment.howToPlay.editName.translation: Tap a name to change how Cozmo says it

faceEnrollment.firstTimeCompleteAlert.de.translation: Cozmo has learned to recognize your face and may say your name when he sees you. Use Meet Cozmo again to introduce him to more friends.
